column7: Problems in historical and systematic musicology or ethnomusicology; discussions of special problems and reports on individual research. May be repeated to a maximum of 8 hours. Prerequisite: Graduate standing in musicology or consent of instructor. Graduate students in music will be considered if they passed MUS 528A (consult Class Schedule for specific section information).
